page.title: 16LIFE STYLES(cont.)
page.content:
VILLAGE FAMILY (cont) The father sometimes plays football. On average they go to the cinema twice a year.Their relatives live in Bognor ( 25 miles away).
FARMING FAMILY This family consists of a mother, father,3 sons and a daughter. Their favourite holiday resorts are by the sea.Their father works on Waterlane Farm.At Christmas all their relatives from Farnborough visit them.Their favourite meal is roast beef and potatoes. The parents go to the pub in the evening for a pint while the children watch T.V. They visit the cinema about once a month for an enjoyable family outing.
